actions.text: Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure failed of passage in House under suspension of rules, roll call #678 (51-191).

official_title: A resolution providing for concurring in the Senate amendment to H.R. 4231 "An Act to designate the 'John D. Larkins, Jr., Federal Building'" with an amendment.

summary.text: Provides for concurring in the Senate amendment to H.R. 4231 ("John D. Larkins, Junior, Federal Building"), with an amendment.

titles.title: A resolution providing for concurring in the Senate amendment to H.R. 4231 "An Act to designate the 'John D. Larkins, Jr., Federal Building'" with an amendment.
